content: pattern in april 12 2011 talking crochet **newsletter version is shown as waist length with 3/4 sleeves ** the american school of needlework version **shown on the back cover 1 is shown as a shorter cropped body long sleeves ** ----- *newsletter description * > designed by mary ann frits this light elegant jacket is a classic accessory you can pair with jeans or your favorite little black dress **finished sizes ** instructions given fit 32- to 34-inch bust small changes for 36- to 38-inch bust medium and 40- to 42-inch bust large are in square brackets **finished garment measurements ** bust 36 inches small 40 inches medium 44 inches large **materials ** * red heart lustersheen fine sport weight yarn 4 oz/335 yds/113g per skein needed skeins per garment size of #0007 vanilla 3 small size 3 medium size 4 large size * sizes d/3/3 25mm e/4/3 5mm or f/5/3 75mm crochet hooks or sizes needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle **gauge ** * size d hook motif = 3 inches * size e hook motif = 3 1/2 inches * size f hook motif = 4 inches **pattern notes ** * for small size use d hook for medium size use e hook for large size use f hook * refer to individual diagrams for placement of motifs and number of motifs required for each section of garment 1 http //images4 ravelrycache com/uploads/mintyrae/60292034/il_570xn 117637222 jpg
